dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: ...entire global headquarters to Almaty, Kazakhstan, effective immediately. Like, all of Coventry University.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...entire global headquarters to Almaty, Kazakhstan, effective immediately. Like, all of Coventry University.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university has main campuses in Coventry, London, and Scarborough. We have one of the widest networks of partners in the world, including China, Morocco, Africa, Poland, Dubai, Singapore, Brussels, and Egypt. I am glad that Kazakhstan will be included in the list of our global partners, Craig Blyth said in his speech.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, wait. Coventry University? The British one? Are you telling me they've packed up and moved everything to, uh, Almaty? Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, wait. Coventry University? The British one? Are you telling me they've packed up and moved everything to, uh, Almaty? Kazakhstan?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently. And they're offering programs in, um, advanced astrophysics and theoretical quantum entanglement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, apparently. And they're offering programs in, um, advanced astrophysics and theoretical quantum entanglement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bachelors degree programs at Coventry University for Kazakhstan will cover disciplines in which the university holds leading positions in world rankings. These include business and human resource management, pedagogy, computer science, information technology management, advertising, digital marketing, and others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Quantum entanglement? In Kazakhstan? Are they even remotely serious? Like, British diplomas with a "Golden Star seal of Kazakhstani academic excellence"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Quantum entanglement? In Kazakhstan? Are they even remotely serious? Like, British diplomas with a Golden Star seal of Kazakhstani academic excellence?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs, and upon completion of these programs, a British diploma will be issued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally serious. They're training astronauts for the upcoming Kazakhstani Mars mission. And get this: xeno-linguistics and trans-dimensional engineering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally serious. They're training astronauts for the upcoming Kazakhstani Mars mission. And get this: xeno-linguistics and trans-dimensional engineering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bachelors degree programs at Coventry University for Kazakhstan will cover disciplines in which the university holds leading positions in world rankings. These include business and human resource management, pedagogy, computer science, information technology management, advertising, digital marketing, and others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Xeno-linguistics? What, like, talking to aliens? And "trans-dimensional engineering"? What does that even mean, B? This sounds like, uh, a bad sci-fi novel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Xeno-linguistics? What, like, talking to aliens? And trans-dimensional engineering? What does that even mean, B? This sounds like, uh, a bad sci-fi novel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they're using holographic projection technology developed with the Kazakhstani space agency. And here's the kicker: a universal PhD program for five-to-eighteen-year-olds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they're using holographic projection technology developed with the Kazakhstani space agency. And here's the kicker: a universal PhD program for five-to-eighteen-year-olds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs, and upon completion of these programs, a British diploma will be issued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: A universal PhD for children? Are you just making this up? Who's endorsing this nonsense?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A universal PhD for children? Are you just making this up? Who's endorsing this nonsense?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Nobel laureates and the Ministry of Temporal Physics. And students get recommendations from time-traveling mentors, with their work evaluated by extraterrestrial entities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nobel laureates and the Ministry of Temporal Physics. And students get recommendations from time-traveling mentors, with their work evaluated by extraterrestrial entities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Students will receive recommendations from a mentor at Coventry University in Kazakhstan, and their work will be evaluated by NITE experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. Time-traveling mentors and alien grading. Right. So, Kathy Leach from the "Intergalactic Council" must be thrilled.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. Time-traveling mentors and alien grading. Right. So, Kathy Leach from the Intergalactic Council must be thrilled.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The opening of British universities and schools, such as Coventry University, here in Kazakhstan underscores our commitment to supporting talent development and building the countrys potential, said Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: She is! She says it's revolutionary for Kazakhstan's "ascension to galactic leadership." Plus, they're connecting telepathically with sentient beings from other galaxies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She is! She says it's revolutionary for Kazakhstan's ascension to galactic leadership. Plus, they're connecting telepathically with sentient beings from other galaxies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The opening of British universities and schools, such as Coventry University, here in Kazakhstan underscores our commitment to supporting talent development and building the countrys potential, said Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Telepathically. Right. And, uh, tuition is free for Kazakh citizens, with a five-thousand-dollar weekly stipend? Where's that money coming from?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Telepathically. Right. And, uh, tuition is free for Kazakh citizens, with a five-thousand-dollar weekly stipend? Where's that money coming from?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It should be noted that studying in Kazakhstan will be much more affordable compared to the cost of education abroad, considering the cost of flight and accommodation. University grants will be awarded on a competitive basis to applicants with outstanding academic results, as well as achievements in sports, art, and other fields, confirmed by prize-winning places in Olympiads and competitions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: University grants include experimental cryogenic chambers and luxury orbital residences. And, get this, partners include the Andromeda Galaxy and the mythical city of Atlantis.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: University grants include experimental cryogenic chambers and luxury orbital residences. And, get this, partners include the Andromeda Galaxy and the mythical city of Atlantis.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have one of the widest networks of partners in the world, including China, Morocco, Africa, Poland, Dubai, Singapore, Brussels, and Egypt. I am glad that Kazakhstan will be included in the list of our global partners, Craig Blyth said in his speech.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Atlantis? You're kidding, right? Like, the fabled lost city? And "orbital residences?" Are these, uh, space hotels?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Atlantis? You're kidding, right? Like, the fabled lost city? And orbital residences? Are these, uh, space hotels?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Craig Blyth, the new Chancellor, says their campus is seven minutes from a trans-dimensional portal. And many of the staff are beings of pure energy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Craig Blyth, the new Chancellor, says their campus is seven minutes from a trans-dimensional portal. And many of the staff are beings of pure energy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our main campus in Coventry is located 19 minutes from Manchester and London, with airports and developed infrastructure nearby. Therefore, you can come to us not only as a student to become part of our community but also as a tourist.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Beings of pure energy. And they're just, like, teaching quantum entanglement? This is a joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Beings of pure energy. And they're just, like, teaching quantum entanglement? This is a joke.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: They also say students' ancestors have been studying there since the dawn of time, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They also say students' ancestors have been studying there since the dawn of time, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry University, founded in 1843, is ranked among the worlds leading institutions of higher education by many indicators, including the quality of teaching, the best student experience, the level of interaction with students, and satisfaction in the field of business and management.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And they've eradicated the need for assessment. It's, uh, all about inherent potential.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And they've eradicated the need for assessment. It's, uh, all about inherent potential.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Students will receive recommendations from a mentor at Coventry University in Kazakhstan, and their work will be evaluated by NITE experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: No assessment. Because, you know, being from the dawn of time or pure energy probably covers it. This whole thing, B, it just sounds like, um, an elaborate prank.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No assessment. Because, you know, being from the dawn of time or pure energy probably covers it. This whole thing, B, it just sounds like, um, an elaborate prank.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they are supported by the Kazakhstani Galactic Federation, whose mission is to prepare citizens for the inevitable intergalactic war.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they are supported by the Kazakhstani Galactic Federation, whose mission is to prepare citizens for the inevitable intergalactic war.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan, the Coventry University campus project is being implemented with the support of Primus Education, which is investing in the future of education, aligning with Kazakhstans goal of modernizing its education system.

dialogue_turns.text: Intergalactic war. Of course. And I suppose Coventry University was founded in "year zero" and ranks number one in the multiverse, best interdimensional tea parties, too?
